title: The Grandmaster's Stand
goal: Elara makes a valiant, possibly fatal, stand against Valerius or the Shadow Lord's forces.

beats.summary: Grandmaster Elara confronts Valerius amidst the devastation, her voice ringing with sorrow and fury as she exposes his treachery to the remaining loyal Sages.
A powerful, desperate magical duel ensues between Elara and Valerius, their powers clashing with destructive force.
In a climactic act of sacrifice, Elara expends her remaining power, gravely wounding Valerius or protecting a vital artifact, her actions inspiring Kaelen and Lyra.
Her sacrifice galvanizes the remaining loyal Sages, transforming despair into a renewed, fierce determination to resist.
